full_summary:
=================
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Request for Standing Offer - W0134-23R005
-----------------------------

**Notice Number**: WS3941225772-notice-publication-1-000
| **Tender Status** | English | French  |
|------------------|---------|---------|
| Expiration       | Expiré  | Expiré   |

### Contract Summary
---------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWPSC) has announced a Request for Standing Offer (RFSo) for the supply of various grocery products to 4 Wing Cold Lake in Alberta, Canada.

### Solicitation and Awarding Body
---------------------------------

* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (Category G)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **End User**: Department of National Defence (DND)

### Product and Service Requirements
---------------------------------

* **Goods and Services**: Various grocery products, including meat and poultry products, dairy products, prepared and preserved foods, fresh fruits, and fresh vegetables.
* **Regions of Delivery**: Cold Lake, Alberta, Canada
* **Contract Period**: Expected contract start date: 2023-06-01, expected contract end date: 2025-05-31

### Bidder Requirements
-------------------

All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted to the Ariba Discovery portal no later than 2023-11-03 at 14:00 Eastern Daylight Time (EDT). Please note that bids submitted after the specified time will be considered non-responsive.

### Contact Information
-------------------

For any inquiries, please contact:

* **Name**: Jill Aquino, Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
* **Email**: [jill.aquino@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jill.aquino@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: Not provided
* **Fax**: Not provided

### Submission Requirements
-------------------------

Please submit your bid via the Ariba Discovery portal at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17527805?extsite=MTc1Mjc4MDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17527805?extsite=MTc1Mjc4MDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
